background.agility and coordination: If character causes friendly fire, it is 50% likely to be in ANY direction.
background.beauty: Character has a beautiful aquiline nose, and also has a swayback.
background.choices: Ability to play a musical instrument of the player's choosing.
background.family composition: Character raised by grandparents on mother's side. Number of first cousins: 3.
background.father legacy: literacy; knowledge of a distant region; bonus weapon proficiency with unusual weapon from that region
background.feats of strength: Weak arms and legs. Treat character's Dexterity as half its actual value (round down) for the purpose of no-fault climbing. Danger climbing ability is reduced by 15%.
background.relationships: Character has been ostracized by her family because of her poor decisions. The character has no access to any family possessions or talents.
background.tendencies: A painful love affair has left the character emotionally toughened. Her Wisdom is treated as 2 points higher when resisting seduction.
